Article.ArticleTitle: Immunopathogenesis and Novel Therapeutics Strategies of Systemic Lupus Erythematosus.

Abstract.AbstractText: Systemic lupus erythematosus is a chronic connective tissue disease of unknown origin and unpredictable course [...].
